texts: We need to see evidence of the vehicle before we can process your application.
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["The V5C vehicle registration certificate (logbook) issued by the DVLA - all pages"]}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["4 photographs of your motor tricycle (front, back and both sides). 1 of these photographs must show the number plate (Vehicle Registration Mark)"]}
You can scan paper documents to your computer, or take photographs of them with your camera, smartphone or tablet. Youâ€™ll need to save each file as a .jpg, .jpeg, .tif, .tiff or .pdf.

Once you have saved your document(s) on your computer/mobile device, drag them into the box below or click 'Or browse to your files' and select the file you want to upload. Double check you have selected the correct file.
Repeat for every document you want to attach. If you make a mistake, you can add or remove files before submitting your application.
